title: Koalas and co
creator_credit: Louise Jonas, Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Non-narrated film which makes use of natural sound to observe some of the Australian animals that live in trees. Koalas, fruit bats, tree frogs and primitive looking lizards are observed in detailed close-ups, highlighting their adaptations to live in trees. Filmed at the Royal Melbourne Zoo, Melbourne Botanic Gardens and Healesville Sanctuary. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
